analysis.key_quote: This proposed policy is just an excuse to impose a loyalty to trump test on civil servants, whose loyalty is meant to be apolitical and to the Constitution and to we the people, not to one person, political party, or branch of government.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the expectation of apolitical loyalty from civil servants, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and constitutional integrity.
